description:
In this course titled ' Hidden Techniques For Creating Chemistry Using NLP ' by Mr. Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn very powerful and simple NLP techniques to impress people and make people like you instantly . People will start believing you, trusting you and build rapport with you instantly .

This course is useful to build long term rapport and relationships with clients, business prospects , spouse, family , strangers etc for mutual benefit . This course will help you identify people much better .

This course contains 10 lectures and approximately 30 minutes of content

The course includes -

  1. Introduction
  2. What is chemistry in basic terms?
  3. How to create chemistry with someone
  4. Matching the actions of others to create long term chemistry
  5. Matching the way others speak to create chemistry
  6. Matching the way others write to create chemistry
  7. Combination of all the above lectures
  8. Make people like you instantly using anchoring technique
  9. Bonus Lecture : Learn to relax instantly using self-hypnosis
  10. Summary Of The Course
title: Hidden Techniques For Creating Chemistry Using NLP
